General.Name: Modernform Group Public Company Limited
General.Description: Modernform Group Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes residential and office furniture in Thailand and internationally. It operates through four segments: Furniture Business, Furniture Fitting and Other Materials Business, Rental and Service Business, and Architectural Design and Construction Business. The company offers office, home, and kitchen furniture. It also provides steel case, walk-in closet and storage, and hardware and fitting furniture. In addition, the company offers architectural design and construction services. It also sells its products through online. The company was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
